mapper.select: select m.name ,re.star ,re.r_writedate ,re.r_content ,re.d_member_idx ,re.d_reserve_idx from d_review re, d_reserve r, d_teachercard t, d_member m where re.d_reserve_idx = r.idx and r.teacher_idx = t.idx and t.d_member_idx = m.idx and re.d_member_idx = #{idx} order by re.r_writedate desc

select m.name ,re.star ,re.r_writedate ,re.r_content ,re.d_member_idx ,re.d_reserve_idx from d_review re, d_reserve r, d_teachercard t, d_member m where re.d_reserve_idx = r.idx and r.teacher_idx = t.idx and t.d_member_idx = m.idx and re.d_member_idx != #{idx} and r.member_p_idx = #{idx} order by re.r_writedate desc

select m.name ,re.star ,re.r_writedate ,re.r_content ,re.d_member_idx ,re.d_reserve_idx from d_review re, d_reserve r, d_member m where re.d_reserve_idx = r.idx and r.member_p_idx = m.idx and re.d_member_idx = #{idx} order by re.r_writedate desc

select m.name ,re.star ,re.r_writedate ,re.r_content ,re.d_member_idx ,re.d_reserve_idx from d_review re, d_reserve r, d_member m where re.d_reserve_idx = r.idx and r.member_p_idx = m.idx and re.d_member_idx != #{idx} and r.teacher_idx = (select tt.idx from d_member mm, d_teachercard tt where mm.idx = tt.d_member_idx and mm.idx = #{idx} ) order by re.r_writedate desc
mapper.insert: insert into d_review values( d_review_idx.nextval, #{d_reserve_idx}, #{d_member_idx}, #{star}, sysdate, #{r_content} )
